reviews.title: Wrong size keyboard
reviews.comment: When I switched to this keyboard, it was only showing half the entire keyboard on my Droid Razr.
reviews.author: Peter Skoropat

reviews.comment: To open: enable in settings, then long press in field. Select russian also, will stay permanent. Works great. (Droid + Ally)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works good on Droid X. Just enable it under Settings>Language & Keyboard and then long press 123 and select input method. Does english keys also.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome, more then i thought possible on this device. Good job, thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Droid x. Once installed my phone gets all screwed up. Uninstalled phone works well again. Too bad :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: pinch zoom on legend stops working when ths keyboard selected as input.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The keyboard is great, but it disables the autocorrect for both my English and Russian keyboards, even with options checked. MyTouch 3G.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent app, couldn\'t survive without it. Works perfectly! \320\241\320\277\320\260\321\201\320\270\320\261\320\276 :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does not launch on HTC evo can not be found. Not good :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice, but not for DROID Bionic
reviews.comment: The keyboard seems like it works good, but on my DROID Bionic it appears in the centre of my screen and doesn\'t expand fully width-wise. Probably because of the larger than normal screen size of the Bionic.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be great to beable to see what youre writing. Not everyone knows crylic. That would def build up the ratings. 4 out of 5*
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: good but need update
reviews.comment: in Galaxy S2.. there is no (setting button) to switch between russian keyboard and the samsung keyboard...this button exist in samsung keyboard on low right position....to swich back you have to go to language setting from outside any application
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excelent
reviews.comment: I love the app, i like how it has the toggle between english an russian, , where u dont have to close it an change it, great app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Perfect application. Switches from English to Russian in a snap. Thank you, great job!
reviews.author: Irene Ross

reviews.comment: Why can\'t you just make different version for hi-res (nexus) screen? I am ready to pay, but this looks ugly blurry...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great follow directions on here and u wont have a prob installing it very simple
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works really good on G1phone.. had this app for ever and still no issues. Thanks guys!

reviews.comment: Love it! Great job!
